input_text:
Job Title: Material Handler - 3rd Shift

Location: New Holland, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
About Leviton

At Leviton, we build what's next to light, power, and connect everyday spaces, from electrical to lighting, to data networks, and energy management. With over 115 years of history, Leviton develops thoughtful solutions that help make its customers' lives easier, safer, more efficient, and more productive. We recognize that our people are our greatest asset. We ASK questions, EMBRACE challenges, SEEK new perspectives, and ANTICIPATE what comes next. It's about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly changing world.

About The Role

Berk-Tek, a Leviton Company, is looking for a Material Handler to join their copper network cable manufacturing operations in New Holland, PA!

This position is responsible for processing materials to support production by performing the duties involved in receiving, stocking, issuing, and/or shipping materials/supplies. Operates material handling equipment in a safe and efficient manner.

Starting pay of $21.00 and up based on experience. Shift premium of $1.25 for working 3rd shift.

Desirable shift schedules! 12-hour workdays on 3rd shift (7pm - 7am). We work just 3 days per week.

Responsibilities

Supports production by pulling and delivering all materials necessary to complete shop ordersSupports receiving by verifying conformance to invoices and stocking all received components on the appropriate shelf locationVerifies and maintains product identification and countPrepares inventory records and investigates discrepancies in stock countsPerforms weigh counts for materials and stores them as necessaryObtains, moves, sorts and packages products and materials


Qualifications

Certified to operate both sit-down and stand-up forklifts, requiredUnderstanding of basic math skills - adding, subtracting and measuringBasic computer skills and working knowledge of Microsoft Office applicationsAbility to communicate effectively both verbally and in written formatAbility to multi-taskAbility to follow written and verbal instructionsAbility to use judgement related to identifying potential safety hazards


Education & Experience

High School Diploma or GED,requiredMinimum three (3) months forklift experience in a warehousing or manufacturing environment


What We Offer

Comprehensive benefits include:

Medical, dental, and vision insurance programs401K plans with employer-matching contributionsTuition reimbursementPTOPaid holidaysVolunteer time offQuarterly bonus program


For more information about benefits, please go to: https://careers.leviton.com/benefits

Leviton is an EEO/AA Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status.

Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform essential job functions.

The future looks brighter than ever. Join our team now!

, #MON, #NS

Experience Level (if available): None
